title: InfoFlo Print Integrations Setup
description: Configure third-party integrations including 4over printing services, MailChimp email marketing, and Shippo shipping solutions for your InfoFlo Print system.

44.name: ltspanStylefontsize
44.text: Insert Your 4over Public Key & Secret below (only if you checked 4over):

61.name: step261
61.text: Insert your MailChimp API Key below (only if you checked MailChimp):

62.name: step2
62.subLabel: Paste your Shippo API Token Key above
62.text: Insert your Shippo API Token Below (only if you checked Shippo):

63.name: input63
63.text:
Step 1:

  1. Register a Shippo Account here: https://apps.goshippo.com/join?

  2. Watch video on how to Add and Connect your Courier accounts:
    https://support.goshippo.com/hc/en-us/articles/360024209911-How-to-Connect-Your-Own-Carrier-Account

  3. Get API Keys: Click on Settings->API->Live token and hit generate. This token can only be generated once and you will not be able to view it after, so please copy the token and store it somewhere safe.

  4. Email Shippo using the following email address: luigi.ramelah@shippo.com OR daniel.hernandez@shippo.com and request a Shippo API Token. Let them know it's for InfoFlo Print site.

  5. Click Next

64.name: typeA64
64.text: What would you like to integrate with?

66.name: input66
66.text:
Step 1: Registering with 4over

1. Register a new account: https://4over.com/company/account/create

2. Once registered, you need to purchase at least once from 4over to save your credit card payment profile.

3. Email Ted Archer at tarcher@4over.com and request your Public Key & Secret for an InfoFlo Print integration: 

4. Once obtained, click next below.

67.name: step267
67.text: Insert Your SanMar Customer ID below (only if you checked SanMar):

69.name: ltpgtltstronggtstep1
69.text:
Step 1: Registering with SanMar

1. Register a new account: https://www.sanmar.com/signup/customer

2. Email SanMar Integration Support at sanmarintegrations@sanmar.com and include your:

  • SanMar Account Username
  • Company Name
  • Registered Email
  • Let them know that you are an InfoFlo Print customer


Request your:

  • Customer ID
  • Username
  • Password


4. Once all 3 are obtained, click next below.

70.name: step3
70.text: Insert Your SanMar Username & Password below (only if you checked SanMar):

71.name: ltpgtltstronggtstep171
71.text:
Step 1: Registering with S&S

1. Register a new account: https://www.ssactivewear.com/myaccount/register

2. Email S&S Support at api@ssactivewear.com  and include your:

  • S&S Account Username
  • Company Name
  • Registered Email
  • Let them know that you are an InfoFlo Print customer


Request your:

  • API Password


4. Once this is obtained, click next below.

72.name: step272
72.text: Insert Your S&S Email below (only if you checked S&S):

73.name: step373
73.text: Insert Your S&S Username & Password below (only if you checked S&S):

74.name: ltpgtltstronggtstep174
74.text:
Step 1: Registering with MailChimp

1. Register a new account: https://login.mailchimp.com/signup/

2. Get your API key from: https://admin.mailchimp.com/account/api/
